Title: Hajj: Edo loses 75-year-old pilgrim in Makkah
Summary: Mrs Adizatu Dazumi died at the ongoing 2025 Hajj pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia after a brief illness . The 75-year-old female pilgrim was from Jattu Uzairue in Etsako West Local Government Area of Edo .

Title: Gunmen kill policeman, three others in Benue
Summary: Police confirmed the killing of its personnel and three others in Gwer West Local Government of the state by suspected armed herdsmen . The State Police Public Relations Officer, SP Sewuese Anene, told newsmen on Monday .

Title: Six fun ways to celebrate Children’s Day
Summary: Every year on May 27, Nigerian families come together to mark Children’s Day, a moment to honour, appreciate, and create special memories with the little ones . While many parents want to go all out, not everyone has the budget to celebrate .

Title: Clampdown on illegal mining brings relief to Kogi community
Summary: Special Mining Marshals of the Nigerian Security and Civil Defence Corps have dismantled a major illegal mining ring operating in the Odagbo-Okaba district . Clampdown on illegal mining brings relief to Kogi community .

Title: Introducing Tonic FC: Cardtonic’s Bold Move Into Nigerian Football
Summary: Cardtonic, one of Nigeria’s top fintech platforms, just made a bold move . Yes, the same brand that helps you trade gift cards and make online payments has now launched a football club .

Title: Nigeria Customs, FMITI launch Nigeria-East/Southern Africa air cargo route
Summary: Nigeria–East/Southern Africa Air Cargo Corridor is a significant step towards enhancing regional trade and deepening integration under the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) The Nigerian Customs Service, NCS, in partnership with the Federal Ministry of Industry, Trade and Investment, has officially launched the route .

Title: Financial Inclusion: CBN expands access with Non-Resident BVN gateway
Summary: The Central Bank of Nigeria recently launched the Non-Resident Biometric Verification Number (NRBVN) platform in Abuja . Title: Dozens of terrorists killed after failed attack in Borno town
Summary: Dozens of terrorists killed after failed attack in Borno town . Troops engaged the terrorists after they attempted to infiltrate the area . A military statement said troops engaged them after they tried to infiltrate area .

Title: IGP launches School Protection Squad to protect students, staff against kidnapping in Nasarawa
Summary: IGP launches School Protection Squad to protect students, staff against kidnapping in Nasarawa . Governor Abdullahi Sule witnessed the launch and commended the IGP for the initiative .

Title: EPL: Champions League absence could benefit Man Utd, says Amorim
Summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says missing out on Champions League football could be a blessing in disguise in his attempts to rebuild the fallen giants . Title: Caution your children against joining cult groups, Okpebholo urges parents
Summary: Edo Governor, Monday Okpebholo extends warm felicitations to all children in Edo State and across Nigeria on the occasion of Children’s Day . Governor urged parents and guardians to dissuade their children from joining cult groups . Title: Gunmen abduct three churchgoers in Ondo
Summary: Gunmen have abducted three members of the Deeper Christian Life Ministry, also known as Deeper Life Bible Church, in Akure North Council Area of Ondo state . Title: Fallen power cable electrocutes three-year-old in Anambra
Summary: Grief struck at Isaiah Morah Close, Awka, the Anambra State capital, on Saturday, when a fallen high tension cable belonging to the Enugu Electricity Distribution Company electrocuted a three-year-old girl in the area .
